title: RBI imposes Rs 3.1 lakh penalty on Hero FinCorp
description: The RBI carried out a statutory inspection of the company, assessing its financial status as of March 31, 2023. Following this inspection, the RBI found instances of non-compliance with its directives and corresponding communication. Consequently, the company received a notice prompting it to explain why penalties shouldn't be applied due to its failure to adhere to the directives.
